casebody.data:
Dana Lydell SMITH, petitioner,
v.
IDAHO. No. 13-5830. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Idaho dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
